#         $ ruby {class_name}.rb <feature_1> <feature_n>

class {class_name}
	{method}
end

if ARGV.length == {n_features}

	# Features:
	features = ARGV.collect {{ |i| i.to_f }}

	# Prediction:
	puts {class_name}.{method_name}(features)
